basics.name: Luca Fehlings
basics.label: Scientist
basics.summary: Device engineer researching memory devices and their integration into CMOS circuits

work.name: University of Groningen
work.summary: Fabrication, electrical characterization on modeling of emerging memory devices for integration with neuromorphic CMOS systems in the course of the ERC starting grant MEMRINESS. Focus on integration of HfO2-based FeRAM with CMOS circuits to realise functional blocks for neurons and synapses with biological time-scales in spiking neural networks.

work.name: NaMLab gGmbH
work.summary: Fabrication, electrical characterization on modeling of emerging memory devices for integration with neuromorphic CMOS systems in the course of the ERC starting grant MEMRINESS.

work.name: Black Semiconductor GmbH
work.summary: Continuation of the previous work on the development of graphene-based electro-optical modulators and photodetectors

work.name: AMO GmbH
work.summary: Fabrication and optical/radio-frequency characterization of graphene-based electro-optical modulators and photodetectors. Process development for i-line lithography, reactive sputter deposition of optical materials. Development of a process flow to pattern, electrically contact and passivate graphene.

work.name: Institut f√ºr Werkstoffe der Elektrotechnik I, RWTH Aachen
work.summary: Fabrication and electro-chemical characterisation of on-chip reference electrodes for biosensor applications. Development of a deposition process to increase the reliability of organic semiconductor-based electrodes

volunteer.summary: Lead organizer for the New York City branch of the People's Climate March, the largest climate march in history.
highlights: Awarded 'Climate Hero' award by Greenpeace for my efforts organizing the march.
Men of the year 2014 by Time magazine
